# Crown of Flame (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], Exalted arcanist 5, [[Glory (Domain)|Glory 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, Archon

**Range:** 10 ft.

**Area:** 10-ft.-radius emanation, centered on you

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 95

You become a blazingly hot beacon of the powers of good, searing all evil outsiders, evil undead, and evil fey within 10 feet of you. Affected creatures take 2d6 points of damage per round.
